nccovid 0.0.1
  • Reference

    nccovid

    The goal of this package is to easily retrieve publically available data regarding the SARS-CoV19 outbreak that is occuring with focus on U.S. cases and associated deaths.

    These data are in no way complete and no guarantees are made.

    To install this package use the following:

    remotes::install_github("conedatascience/nccovid")
